description: Led the development and modernization of a web application(Angular 17 / 16 / 13 / 10 / 8), enhancing user engagement and system efficiency. Managed Angular upgrades and optimized open-source library integration.
Championed improvements to the user interface based on technical feasibility assessments, resulting in a 40% increase in positive user reviews citing ease of navigation and intuitive design.
Mentored 5+ junior UI developers, conducted all code reviews, accelerated onboarding, and improved team productivity through hands-on guidance in product features and tech stack.
Developed 10+ major reusable UI components in Angular, ensuring quality standards and accelerating development time by 75%.
Refactored code with reusable components to ease future maintenance and reduce code additions during bug fixes and feature updates.
Implemented GitHub Copilot to assist with code reviews and unit testing, leveraging AI to improve development efficiency and code quality.
Utilized GitHub Copilot in Agent Mode within VS Code to develop new UI screens, achieving a 40% reduction in development time through AI-assisted coding.

roles.name: Software Engineer
description: Built full-stack applications with Progress 4GL and ADM, ensuring functionality and scalability.
Resolved customer issues by understanding their needs and delivering effective solutions.
Collaborated within a Scrum framework, contributing to a streamlined development process and shared team goals.

Ensured high code quality by enforcing coding standards, test-driven development, and pair programming, while continuously refactoring code to improve performance, reduce complexity, and maintain reliable unit test coverage.
Acquired proficiency in Angular and contributed to building enterprise-level web applications from the ground up as part of a legacy-to-modern UI migration to Angular.
Contributed to the UI design phase of an Angular-based application, establishing standardized UI patterns to deliver a cohesive and user-centric interface.

roles.name: Associate Software Engineer
description: Independently developed and managed new functional modules, contributing to the software's growth and enhancement.
Proactively tackled longstanding backlog issues by delivering quick, effective solutions while deepening expertise in the software’s functional architecture.
Served as the primary point of contact for issue resolution during regression testing, leveraging strong problem-solving skills and efficient code development.

roles.name: Intern
description: Received hands-on training on the company’s software product, its features, and market applications.
Gained expertise in Progress 4GL and ADM tools, the core technology used in the software development process.
Proactively identified and resolved existing software bugs during the regression cycle while gathering new requirements for early-stage development.
Excelled in training and demonstrated strong performance in developing new requirements.
